title: Unable to edit/veiw runes reforged in pregame lobby or in main menu

replies.body:
I have had this problem. One way I found was in lobby select another rune page, then select a second one, then try and edit. 
I haven't seen if it works for anyone else.

Thanks for letting us know what worked :D

It's always a big help when people let us know because when someone has this same issue, we can directly guide them to what we know has worked in the past.

Oh I remember, back in the pre-OCE and graphical update days when bugs roamed free, the forums were a leaguers best friend in fixing the issues based on what others tried. Who knows, could be an unrelated issue but every little bit helps.
